collection_no_shop_yet: This collection does not have a shop yet
collection_sharing_desc: Create collections of files to share with others
collection_sync_desc: Share collections via BLE or local network
collection_type_desc_alerts: Receive and manage alerts and notifications. Stay informed about important updates and events in your network.
collection_type_desc_backup: Securely backup your data to other devices with end-to-end encryption. Be a backup provider for others.
collection_type_desc_blog: Publish articles and posts for sharing your thoughts, tutorials, or updates. Supports rich content with images and formatting.
collection_type_desc_chat: Real-time messaging with support for multiple channels. Perfect for team communication or group discussions.
collection_type_desc_console: Run Alpine Linux virtual machines with TinyEMU emulator. Access a full Linux terminal, mount host folders, and connect to network services.
collection_type_desc_contacts: Store contact information for people and organizations. Keep your network organized and accessible.
collection_type_desc_email: Decentralized email with NOSTR-based identity for cryptographic signatures. Send and receive emails through your station with end-to-end verification.
collection_type_desc_events: Create and manage events with dates, times, locations, and attendee registration. Great for organizing meetups or activities.
collection_type_desc_files: Store and organize files in custom folders. Create multiple collections for different purposes like documents, photos, or projects.
collection_type_desc_forum: Discussion forum for threaded conversations and community discussions. Topics are organized by categories with support for replies and moderation.
collection_type_desc_groups: Organize people into groups for easier management and communication. Create teams or interest groups.
collection_type_desc_market: List items for sale, trade, or giveaway. A simple marketplace for your community.
collection_type_desc_news: Share news and announcements with your network. Keep your community informed about updates and important information.
collection_type_desc_places: Save and share locations with maps, coordinates, and descriptions. Document interesting places or share recommendations.
collection_type_desc_postcards: Send and receive digital postcards with images and personal messages. A fun way to share memories and greetings.
collection_type_desc_station: Station configuration for network communication settings. Manage how your node connects to the network.
collection_type_desc_transfer: Centralized download and upload center with progress tracking, retry logic, and metrics.
collection_type_desc_inventory: Track and manage your items with folder-based organization. Keep track of quantities, usage, expiry dates, and borrowed items.
collection_type_desc_wallet: Track debts and payments between parties with NOSTR-signed receipts. Cryptographically verifiable records of money and time owed.
collection_type_desc_log: View application logs for debugging and monitoring. Track system events, errors, and activity.
collection_type_desc_www: Host a personal website with full HTML, CSS, and JavaScript support. Accessible via your station URL.
collection_type_exists_message: This collection type already exists. Each type can only have one instance.
collection_type_features_backup: End-to-end encryption|Multiple providers|Automatic scheduling|Full restore support
collection_type_features_blog: Rich text editor|Image embedding|Draft saving|Post scheduling
collection_type_features_chat: Multiple channels|Text, image, and file sharing|Message history|Participant management
collection_type_features_console: Alpine Linux VM|Mount host folders|Network access|Save/restore state
collection_type_features_email: NOSTR signature verification|Threaded conversations|Attachments with deduplication|Labels and folders|Multi-station identities
collection_type_features_files: Organize files by folders|Share with specific users|Set visibility permissions|Multiple collections allowed
collection_type_features_forum: Threaded discussions|Categories and topics|User moderation|Pinned topics
collection_type_features_transfer: Resume capability|Automatic retry|Patient mode|Priority queue|Ban list|Metrics
collection_type_features_inventory: Folder-based organization|Quantity and usage tracking|Batch/lot management with expiry|Borrowing and lending|200+ item types with templates
collection_type_features_wallet: NOSTR-signed receipts|Multi-currency support|Time-based debts|Payment tracking|Witness signatures|Photo evidence
collection_type_features_log: Real-time updates|Filter by level|Search logs|Export logs
collection_type_features_www: Full web hosting|Custom HTML/CSS/JS|Accessible at station-url/callsign
collection_type_desc_tracker: Track your personal health, fitness, and activities. Record GPS paths, exercises, measurements, and more with privacy-first design.
collection_type_features_tracker: GPS path recording|Exercise tracking|Health measurements|Fitness plans|Location sharing|Place check-ins|Proximity tracking
collection_type_desc_videos: Share and stream videos from your device. Videos stay on your device and are streamed via WebRTC on demand, with metadata syncing to your station.
collection_type_features_videos: Local video playback|WebRTC streaming|Thumbnail generation|Folder organization|Category filtering|Likes and comments
collection_type_desc_work: Create and organize workspaces with NDF documents including spreadsheets, rich text documents, presentations, and forms. Sync-based collaboration with NOSTR signatures.
collection_type_features_work: Spreadsheets with formulas|Rich text documents|Presentations with slides|Forms with responses|Workspace collaboration
collection_updates_desc: Notify when collections are updated or synced
